Message.Msg: Better get cremated or I'll be #$%$ on your grave for years to come. Can you say Republican? I'll be putting the current candidates sign on your bump showing who you don't support Can you say GWB? ~ LOL

Message.Title: When My Poor Broke Failed Dad Failed Grand Pa John Osborne (Johns.Joint) Ebay's Failing z50com Goes Straight To Hades
Message.Msg: She will NOT pass Go or collect $200, but only have her miserable failure of being the daily 12 year board troll here, and her own evil sickness ringing eternally in her ears in the hot fires of hades. Troll that board eternally loser. Even her own neglected children and grand children will #$%$ on her grave. We all can see she is utterly obsessed and not worth another breath. Even poor Uncle Flyktning, my failed daddy's boyfriend, and Sybil Sully will #$%$ on Johnie too but that's just because they can no longer hold their bladders. Old "men" in a lost game. Poor Johnie, The biggest failure ever! 12 years for nothing! Being nothing. Standing for nothing, but her hate. It would be funny if this had not been at the cost of her, and others, families. Oh well, karma will be served. Piping hot! A true failure is when your family hates you. Enjoy!
